section.title: Pre-requisites
section.para: The files: adl-backend-static*.jar, adl-frontend-static*.jar and cpl-preproc-static*.jar are required in the ext sub-directory of the Mind C compiler directory.

section.title: Parameters
section.para: To activate the &productName; for a compilation, the option --optimize or -O must be used with the mindc command line.
